00036 BlockCompressionCodecZlib::BlockCompressionCodecZlib(const Args &args)
00037   : m_inflate_initialized(false), m_deflate_initialized(false),
00038     m_level(Z_BEST_SPEED) {
00039   if (!args.empty())
00040     set_args(args);
00041 }

00044 
00048 BlockCompressionCodecZlib::~BlockCompressionCodecZlib() {
00049   if (m_deflate_initialized)
00050     deflateEnd(&m_stream_deflate);
00051   if (m_inflate_initialized)
00052     inflateEnd(&m_stream_inflate);
00053 }

00056 
00057 void BlockCompressionCodecZlib::set_args(const Args &args) {
00058   Args::const_iterator it = args.begin(), arg_end = args.end();
00059 
00060   for (; it != arg_end; ++it) {
00061     if (*it == "--best" || *it == "-9") {
00062       m_level = Z_BEST_COMPRESSION;
00063       if (m_deflate_initialized) {
00064         deflateEnd(&m_stream_deflate);
00065         m_deflate_initialized = false;
00066       }
00067     }
00068     else if (*it == "--normal") {
00069       m_level = Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION;
00070       if (m_deflate_initialized) {
00071         deflateEnd(&m_stream_deflate);
00072         m_deflate_initialized = false;
00073       }
00074     }
00075     else {
00076       HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_INVALID_ARG, "Unrecognized argument "
00077                 "to Zlib codec: '%s'", (*it).c_str());
00078     }
00079   }
00080 }

00087 void
00088 BlockCompressionCodecZlib::deflate(const DynamicBuffer &input,
00089     DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header, size_t reserve) {
00090   // see http://www.zlib.net/zlib_tech.html
00091   uint32_t avail_out = input.fill() + 6 + (((input.fill() / 16000) + 1) * 5);
00092 
00093   if (!m_deflate_initialized) {
00094     memset(&m_stream_deflate, 0, sizeof(m_stream_deflate));
00095     m_stream_deflate.zalloc = Z_NULL;
00096     m_stream_deflate.zfree = Z_NULL;
00097     m_stream_deflate.opaque = Z_NULL;
00098     int ret = deflateInit(&m_stream_deflate, m_level);
00099     assert(ret == Z_OK);
00100     (void)ret;
00101     m_deflate_initialized = true;
00102   }
00103 
00104   output.clear();
00105   output.reserve(header.length() + avail_out + reserve);
00106 
00107   m_stream_deflate.avail_in = input.fill();
00108   m_stream_deflate.next_in = input.base;
00109 
00110   m_stream_deflate.avail_out = avail_out;
00111   m_stream_deflate.next_out = output.base + header.length();
00112 
00113   int ret = ::deflate(&m_stream_deflate, Z_FINISH);
00114   assert(ret == Z_STREAM_END);
00115   (void)ret;
00116 
00117   uint32_t zlen = avail_out - m_stream_deflate.avail_out;
00118 
00119   /* check for an incompressible block */
00120   if (zlen >= input.fill()) {
00121     header.set_compression_type(NONE);
00122     memcpy(output.base+header.length(), input.base, input.fill());
00123     header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00124     header.set_data_zlength(input.fill());
00125   }
00126   else {
00127     header.set_compression_type(ZLIB);
00128     header.set_data_length(input.fill());
00129     header.set_data_zlength(zlen);
00130   }
00131 
00132   header.set_data_checksum(fletcher32(output.base + header.length(),
00133                            header.get_data_zlength()));
00134 
00135   deflateReset(&m_stream_deflate);
00136 
00137   output.ptr = output.base;
00138   header.encode(&output.ptr);
00139   output.ptr += header.get_data_zlength();
00140 }

00142 
00146 void
00147 BlockCompressionCodecZlib::inflate(const DynamicBuffer &input,
00148     DynamicBuffer &output, BlockCompressionHeader &header) {
00149   int ret;
00150   const uint8_t *msg_ptr = input.base;
00151   size_t remaining = input.fill();
00152 
00153   if (!m_inflate_initialized) {
00154     memset(&m_stream_inflate, 0, sizeof(m_stream_inflate));
00155     m_stream_inflate.zalloc = Z_NULL;
00156     m_stream_inflate.zfree = Z_NULL;
00157     m_stream_inflate.opaque = Z_NULL;
00158     m_stream_inflate.avail_in = 0;
00159     m_stream_inflate.next_in = Z_NULL;
00160     int ret = inflateInit(&m_stream_inflate);
00161     assert(ret == Z_OK);
00162     (void)ret;
00163     m_inflate_initialized = true;
00164   }
00165 
00166   header.decode(&msg_ptr, &remaining);
00167 
00168   if (header.get_data_zlength() != remaining)
00169     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_BAD_HEADER, "Block decompression error, "
00170               "header zlength = %lu, actual = %lu",
00171               (Lu)header.get_data_zlength(), (Lu)remaining);
00172 
00173   uint32_t checksum = fletcher32(msg_ptr, remaining);
00174 
00175   if (checksum != header.get_data_checksum())
00176     HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_CHECKSUM_MISMATCH, "Compressed block "
00177               "checksum mismatch header=%lx, computed=%lx",
00178               (Lu)header.get_data_checksum(), (Lu)checksum);
00179 
00180   try {
00181     output.reserve(header.get_data_length());
00182 
00183      // check compress bit
00184     if (header.get_compression_type() == NONE)
00185       memcpy(output.base, msg_ptr, header.get_data_length());
00186     else {
00187 
00188       m_stream_inflate.avail_in = remaining;
00189       m_stream_inflate.next_in = (Bytef *)msg_ptr;
00190 
00191       m_stream_inflate.avail_out = header.get_data_length();
00192       m_stream_inflate.next_out = output.base;
00193 
00194       ret = ::inflate(&m_stream_inflate, Z_NO_FLUSH);
00195       if (ret != Z_STREAM_END)
00196         HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_INFLATE_ERROR, "Compressed block "
00197                   "inflate error (return value = %d)", ret);
00198 
00199       if (m_stream_inflate.avail_out != 0)
00200         HT_THROWF(Error::BLOCK_COMPRESSOR_INFLATE_ERROR, "Compressed block "
00201                   "inflate error, expected %lu but only inflated to %lu bytes",
00202                   (Lu)header.get_data_length(),
00203                   (Lu)header.get_data_length() - m_stream_inflate.avail_out);
00204 
00205       ::inflateReset(&m_stream_inflate);
00206     }
00207 
00208     output.ptr = output.base + header.get_data_length();
00209   }
00210   catch (Exception &e) {
00211     ::inflateReset(&m_stream_inflate);
00212     output.free();
00213     throw;
00214   }
00215 }
